abstract: Any change in market conditions would vary the size of Intel’s profit, but for A.M.D. it can mean the difference between a big profit and a big loss.
snippet: Any change in market conditions would vary the size of Intel’s profit, but for A.M.D. it can mean the difference between a big profit and a big loss.
lead_paragraph: IF the semiconductor industry were a seesaw, Intel would be anchored close to the middle, experiencing relatively gentle ups and downs. Advanced Micro Devices would be on one of the ends, clinging with both hands.

headline.main: With A.M.D., Riding Waves of Volatility
headline.print_headline: With A.M.D., Riding Waves Of Volatility
